note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2017 prices. Depending on the country and year, it relates to income measured after taxes and benefits, or to consumption, [per capita](#dod:per-capita).
title: Income or consumption of the poorest 10%
subtitle: This is the level of income or consumption per person per day below which 10% of the population falls. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
